title: Ultimate Dilemma: Forgive Me Lord
description: Preston Owens, a Baptist minister, divorces his wife of twelve years not revealing to his congregation or family the true reason why. Soon after the divorce is finalized Preston marries Monique Cheri Anderson, a local news reporter and the speculation behind his actions leave people to form their own opinions about his motive.After being shunned, Preston and Cheri move to Birmingham, Alabama in an effort to rebuild their lives from a new start. But when Preston is asked to take a position as assistant pastor of a troubled church, the need for the past to be revealed becomes more important than the people the secret has protected.
author: Reign*
